mehidi sahabhagikayinwa tribyuts lesin handunwana athara owun kapital aganuwara mangin palanaya karana elimahan anganayaka, ek pudgalayek ithiri wana thuru maranaya thek satan kala yuthuya. 74 wana warshika hangar gems hi prim ros nam wu thama bala naganiyage sthanaya wenuwata swechchawen idiripath wana 12 wana disthrikkaye 16 hawiridi katnis ewardin nam wu tharuniyage kathanayak lesa mema kathawa digahare. 12 wana disthrikkaye pirimi pasin tribyut keneku lesa theri pathwanne katnis ge pawula kusaginne thawena wita, thama pawule bekariyen ayata pan laba dun katnis ge pasal mithureku wu pita melark ya.

janadhipathithuma amarikawata gos wishishta rajya thanthrikayekuge swabhawaya pennuwa	2011 sapthambar 28 weni badada, 06:43	amathya nimal siripala da silwaathigaru janadhipathithumata jathyanthara washayen wiwidha abhiyoga rashiyak pana nangi thibiya di pasugiyada amarikawata gos kesara sinhayek lesa wishishta rajya thanthrikayekuge swabhawaya penwamin jathiye prodathwaya raka ganimata katayuthu kala bawa warimarga ha jala kalamanakarana amathya nimal siripala da silwa mahatha pawasayi.

mita siyawas 7-8 kata pera minisage parama aayusha ada thibenawata wada behewinma adu agayaka pawathunu bawath gal yugaye minisage thaththwaya eetath wada abhagya sampanna bawath, parisayata etharam ‘winayak’ no kala ee yugaye lokaya minisata etharamma akarunika wuye mandayi owuhu thawaduratath pa්rashna karathi.
siya piyata athiwi athi rogi thaththwaya suwa kirima sandaha diyaniyan dedena samanga lingika asurak pawathwiya yuthu yayi kakirawa pradeshaye padinchi kapuwaku yojana kara thibe.
wesak uthsawaya kiyanne winoda ulelak noweyi.
hama ayakuma awanka lesin thama diwi pewetha sakas kara yuthu bawath, sesu manawayanta ha soba dahamata garu karamin ehi niratha wiya yuthu bawath boho sanskruthinge piliganenawa.

samagaru uda pinun gahanawa, samaharu bada pinun..oya asse ekek innawa uuta mona pinumakwath ba.

"aasanik thibu pamanin wakugadu rogaya nowalandena bawa" me masa 10 wani da ‘irida diwayinata’ liyana mohu, giya masa 19 wani da ‘irida diwayinata’ liwe meseya: "rajarata nidhangatha wakugadu rogayata pa්radhana hethuwa aasanik bawata siyayata 99 kma sahathika bawath, kruminashaka saha krushi rasayana bohomayaka (danata apa pariksha kara athi siyallehi) aasanik adangu bawath, rajarata nipadawana sahalwala da aasanik adangu bawath, kalaniya wishwa widyalayata sambandha rajarata nidhangatha wakugadu rogaya pilibanda gaweshanaya karana kandayama (ohuge kandayama) pa්rakasha kara dan sathi kihipayakma gathawi atha."
